TrEd Extension: parallel (version 1.2)

Extension for parallel treebank alignment

Description:

Provides schema, annotation mode, and PML-TQ extensions for node-to-node stand-off parallel treebank alignment.

Installation

This extension can be installed directly from TrEd, using Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Get New Extensions; just make sure the repository http://ufal.mff.cuni.cz/~pajas/tred/extensions/ is enabled in Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Edit Repositories.

TrEd macro files:

  • parallel/contrib.mac
  • parallel/parallel.mak

Resource files:

  • alignment_schema.xml
